item.title: Timer Tele?
item.dc:creator: @MikE_iZ_SicK MikE iZ SicK
item.description:
@MikE_iZ_SicK wrote:

alright so i want to make it so when you go to an area you get teled after a certain amout of time… i think it should look somthing like this, off the top of my head

if (pestCtrlTimer == 0) { pestCtrlTimer -= 1; } if (pestCtrlTimer == -50) { (absX >=2773 && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766 && absY <=2770 ) teleportToX = 2658; teleportToY = 2608; pestCtrlTimer = 0; sendMessage("The game starts!"); }[code/]
